name: Vajpayee Sports Club
description: Vajpayee Sports Club is a local badminton and multi-sport community club in Rajajinagar, Bengaluru, located near Mariappanapalya Park. Primarily serving local players and tournaments, it‚Äôs a members-oriented venue with basic badminton facilities.
highlights: Used for organizing local/state-level tournaments (e.g., Vajpayee Memorial Cup)
Basic amenities: parking, washrooms, coaching available

facilities.name: Badminton Courts

facilities.name: Parking & Washrooms
